content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hubstaff is an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"optional\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" tool that can be used \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to track your working time and identify time patterns, such as applications used, websites visited, time spent in collaboration with others, and other relevant details\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". As a result, you clearly understand the time-to-performance ratio, gaining the ability to plan your project work effectively and efficiently.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hubstaff securely collects data according to applicable data protection laws.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IMPORTANT:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Despite using Hubstaff, daily time reporting in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is mandatory.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to use it?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you want to start using Hubstaff, please \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caCreatAccount\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"submit a request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and wait for instructions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the start of the working day, you turn it on and turn it off when ready to call it a day. It’s important to note: if Hubstaff tracks more or less than 8 hours a day (within 25% limit)—there’s no reason to worry.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":36737,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03/hubnew1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03/hubnew1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hubnew1.PNG\",\"name\":\"hubnew1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bc4a6e60-74a6-41b1-b5bd-ae54327dcd03\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":384,\"height\":208},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As can:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":21324,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a3359ea-5949-44c5-9bc2-c82e9a99dda7/hubnew2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4a3359ea-5949-44c5-9bc2-c82e9a99dda7/hubnew2.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hubnew2.PNG\",\"name\":\"hubnew2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4a3359ea-5949-44c5-9bc2-c82e9a99dda7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":625,\"height\":274},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hubstaff tracks time that is then distributed to productivity buckets (Producing, Research, Collaboration, Other) and supplied to other Productivity components, such as the Telescope widgets, Productivity Coach notifications, BI Reports, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":22418,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aeafc58c-fd7b-4a23-b518-ba1065a47a46/hub1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aeafc58c-fd7b-4a23-b518-ba1065a47a46/hub1.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hub1.jpg\",\"name\":\"hub1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aeafc58c-fd7b-4a23-b518-ba1065a47a46\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":585,\"height\":308},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://delivery.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Central\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" provides Teams—a Productivity component that allows Product Managers, Resource Managers, HRs, and Employees to gain actionable insights into Productivity on the personal and team level via metrics such as Work-Time Distribution, Work-Time Diary Chart, Closed Tasks Metric, Expected vs Reported Time Metric, and \\\"How Fast the Person Is\\\" Metric.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":28981,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/70b109b6-63c7-4242-ac1b-0f41b16d7cce/hub2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/70b109b6-63c7-4242-ac1b-0f41b16d7cce/hub2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hub2.png\",\"name\":\"hub2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"70b109b6-63c7-4242-ac1b-0f41b16d7cce\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":281,\"height\":307},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope widgets visualize productivity information supplied by Productivity Coach, showing a detailed breakdown of the hours worked and apps and URLs used by remote workers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23222,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a6da33c-123a-4f2b-b472-1e3962dbfde3/hub3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a6da33c-123a-4f2b-b472-1e3962dbfde3/hub3.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hub3.jpg\",\"name\":\"hub3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1a6da33c-123a-4f2b-b472-1e3962dbfde3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":240,\"height\":525},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Weekly and monthly workload reviews give you details of reported and (optionally) tracked time for all your projects, while weekly productivity notifications provide an overview of your time patterns, including hours you have spent
